available_for_new_selection.description: Whether this bolt-on can be sold/redeemed

plan_key.description: Key for grouping the same plan

is_available.description: Whether this bundle is available to be selected

phone_number.description: This needs to match the msisdn, e.g. 447123456789)

bundle_only.description: Tick if this component is only available in bundles. Untick if you want it to be allowed separately

allow_custom_limit.description: Allow a limit lower than max limit

available_for_new_plans.description: Whether the client can use this component in new plans

prorates_on_activation.description: Whether the provider prorates on activation

only_bills_full_months.description: Whether the provider only bills full months

is_demo.description: Whether this provider is a demo provider

activation_date.description: Date the sim was activated - used for prorating

is_data_barred.description: Temporary kludge until we can determine barring status from API

SimStatusEnum.description:
* `inactive` - Inactive
* `active` - Active
* `suspended` - Suspended
* `terminated` - Terminated
* `pending-activation` - Pending Activation
* `requires-activation` - Requires Activation
* `preactivating` - Preactivating
* `preactive` - Preactive

intended_sim_type.description:
The type of SIM the subscriber intends to use (stored for the signup flow) - this belongs on the subscription for multi-subscription but for now it can live here

* `physical` - Physical
* `esim` - eSIM
